meta-runner.name: DoIt: Jasmine tests runner
meta-runner.description: Runs Jasmine JS tests and collects coverage info

param.name: jasmine.phantomJsPath
param.spec: text validationMode='not_empty' label='PhantomJs' description='Path to PhantomJS executable' display='normal'

param.name: jasmine.runJasminePath
param.spec: text validationMode='not_empty' label='Jasmine' description='Path to Jasmine script' display='normal'

param.name: jasmine.testRunnerPagePath
param.spec: text validationMode='not_empty' label='Test runner page' description='Path to test runner html page. If tests are executed with coverage it has to be relative to DocumentRoot' display='normal'

param.name: jasmine.enableCoverage
param.spec: checkbox checkedValue='$true' description='If checked information about tests coverage will be collected' uncheckedValue='$false' label='Collect coverage' display='normal'

param.name: jasmine.outputDir
param.spec: text label='Reports directory' description='Directory with generated coverage reports' display='normal'

param.name: jasmine.documentRoot
param.spec: text label='Scripts root directory' description='Path to the root directory of tested scripts' display='normal'

param.name: jasmine.noInstrumentPaths
param.spec: text label='Paths not instrumented' description='URLs not to be instrumented by JsCover (e.g. external libraries, tests)' display='normal'

param.name: jasmine.noInstrumentRegExp
param.spec: text label='Regex of not instrumented paths' description='Regular expressions of URLs not to be instrumented by JsCover' display='normal'
